metadata.synopsis: Party comments the death of Hope by Raphael's hands
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Launch CTY_Main_A2. teleport S_LOW_HouseOfHope_RaphaelSpotTrigger3. oe LOW_HOH_CallRaphael4. teleport S_LOW_RealHope

0.speaker: Player
0.text: The end of the line for Hope. May she rest in peace - at last.
